oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fort Loudoun, July 1954, Queen Bastion and the Old Well. The salient angle of Queen Bastion was the site of the original garrison's Smith's Shop and Guard House. Path of No. 1 Sentry post ran between well and wall.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Conservation & restoration; Forts & fortifications; Historic sites; Ruins; Walls
